languages.text: "Быть может, то, что между нами, не столь тяжким бременем легло тебе на сердце, Домин'{name}..." {n}Кибелла облизывает губы, которые расползаются в злой ухмылке.{/n} "Ведь я не единственная, с кем ты связан{mf||а}".
languages.translation_comment: Если в романсе еще с кем-то другим

traits.locale_text: "Быть может, то, что между нами, не столь тяжким бременем легко тебе на сердце, Эним'{name}..." {n}Кибелла облизывает губы, которые затем расползаются в злой ухмылке.{/n} "Я не единственная, с кем ты связан{mf||а}. Мне хорошо это известно".

languages.translation_comment: Если в романсе еще с кем-то другим

languages.text: "Perhaps our bond is not as heavy a burden on your heart as it is on mine, Domin'{name}..." {n}Kibellah licks her lips as they curl into a malicious smile.{/n} "After all, I'm not the only one you have bonded with."
languages.original_text: "Быть может, то, что между нами, не столь тяжким бременем легло тебе на сердце, Домин'{name}..." {n}Кибелла облизывает губы, которые расползаются в злой ухмылке.{/n} "Ведь я не единственная, с кем ты связан{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps our bond is not as difficult a burden on your heart, Enim'{name}..." {n}Kibellah licks her lips, and they spread into a malicious smile.{/n} "After all, I'm not the only one you have bonded with."

"Perhaps our bond is not as difficult a burden on your heart, Enim'{name}..." {n}Kibellah licks her lips, and they spread into a malicious smile.{/n} "After all, I'm not the only one you have bonded with."

"Perhaps our bond is not as heavy a burden on your heart as it is on mine, Enim'{name}..." {n}Kibellah licks her lips as they curl into a malicious smile.{/n} "After all, I'm not the only one you have bonded with."

"Perhaps our bond is not as heavy a burden on your heart as it is on mine, Enim'{name}..." {n}Kibellah licks her lips as they curl into a malicious smile.{/n} "After all, I'm not the only one you have bonded with."

"Perhaps our bond is not as heavy a burden on your heart as it is on mine, Domin'{name}..." {n}Kibellah licks her lips as they curl into a malicious smile.{/n} "After all, I'm not the only one you have bonded with."

"Perhaps our bond is not as heavy a burden on your heart as it is on mine, Domin'{name}..." {n}Kibellah licks her lips as they curl into a malicious smile.{/n} "After all, I'm not the only one you have bonded with."

languages.text: "Vielleicht ist unsere Verbindung für Euer Herz keine so große Last wie für das meine, Domin'{name} ..." {n}Kibellah leckt sich die Lippen und schenkt dir ein gehässiges Lächeln.{/n} "Schließlich bin ich nicht die Einzige, mit der Ihr Euch verbunden habt."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps our bond is not as heavy a burden on your heart as it is on mine, Domin'{name}..." {n}Kibellah licks her lips as they curl into a malicious smile.{/n} "After all, I'm not the only one you have bonded with."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht ist unsere Verbindung für Euer Herz keine so große Last wie für das meine, Domin'{name} ..." {n}Kibellah leckt sich die Lippen und schenkt dir ein gehässiges Lächeln.{/n} "Schließlich bin ich nicht die Einzige, mit der Ihr Euch verbunden habt."

languages.text: «Tal vez nuestro vínculo no sea una carga tan pesada para su corazón como lo es para el mío, Domin'{name}...». {n}Kibellah se relame antes de esbozar una sonrisa taimada.{/n} «Después de todo, no soy la única persona con la que se ha vinculado».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps our bond is not as heavy a burden on your heart as it is on mine, Domin'{name}..." {n}Kibellah licks her lips as they curl into a malicious smile.{/n} "After all, I'm not the only one you have bonded with."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez nuestro vínculo no sea una carga tan pesada para su corazón como lo es para el mío, Domin'{name}...». {n}Kibellah se relame antes de esbozar una sonrisa taimada.{/n} «Después de todo, no soy la única persona con la que se ha vinculado».

languages.text: 「私たちの絆は…きっとあなたにとっては、私が感じているほど重荷ではないのかもしれないわね、ドミン・{name}…」{n}キベラは不敵な笑みを浮かべつつ唇を舐める。{/n}「結局、あなたが絆を深めてきたのは私だけじゃない」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps our bond is not as heavy a burden on your heart as it is on mine, Domin'{name}..." {n}Kibellah licks her lips as they curl into a malicious smile.{/n} "After all, I'm not the only one you have bonded with."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの絆は…きっとあなたにとっては、私が感じているほど重荷ではないのかもしれないわね、エニム・{name}…」{n}キベラは不敵な笑みを浮かべつつ唇を舐める。{/n}「結局、あなたが絆を深めてきたのは私だけじゃない」

languages.text: “或许对你而言，你我之间的联结并不像对我而言那样沉重，秘者{name}……”{n}绮贝菈舔了舔嘴唇，嘴角露出了恶意的微笑。{/n}“毕竟，我并不是唯一一个与你有联结的人。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps our bond is not as heavy a burden on your heart as it is on mine, Domin'{name}..." {n}Kibellah licks her lips as they curl into a malicious smile.{/n} "After all, I'm not the only one you have bonded with."

traits.locale_text: “或许对你而言，你我之间的联结并不像对我而言那样沉重，秘者{name}……”{n}绮贝菈舔了舔嘴唇，嘴角露出了恶意的微笑。{/n}“毕竟，我并不是唯一一个与你有联结的人。”

languages.text: « Notre lien n'est peut-être pas un fardeau aussi lourd à porter pour vous que pour moi, Domin'{name},{n}dit Kibellah en retroussant les lèvres en un sourire malicieux.{/n} Je ne suis après tout pas la seule avec qui vous avez formé une telle relation. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps our bond is not as heavy a burden on your heart as it is on mine, Domin'{name}..." {n}Kibellah licks her lips as they curl into a malicious smile.{/n} "After all, I'm not the only one you have bonded with."

traits.locale_text: « Notre lien n'est peut-être pas un fardeau aussi lourd à porter pour vous que pour moi, Domin'{name},{n}dit Kibellah en retroussant les lèvres en un sourire malicieux.{/n} Je ne suis après tout pas la seule avec qui vous avez formé une telle relation. »

languages.text: "Belki de bağımız, senin yüreğine benimki kadar yük olmuyordur Domin'{name}..." {n}Kibellah, habis bir gülümseme beliren dudaklarını yalıyor.{/n} "Ne de olsa tek bağ kurduğun ben değilim."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps our bond is not as heavy a burden on your heart as it is on mine, Domin'{name}..." {n}Kibellah licks her lips as they curl into a malicious smile.{/n} "After all, I'm not the only one you have bonded with."
